creator: WATT+VOLT
descriptionHtml:
MyWatt has been renewed and offers even greater possibilities to WATT + VOLT customers.
Now you have the complete control of your bill and may enjoy innovative services easily and quickly via MyWatt App.

Itemized bills


Learn everything about your bill analysis with a clear indication of the charges for the energy you consume. Track their expiration date, the differences in the consumption among your current bills and older ones and download whichever you wish in a pdf format.

History and comparison


Track the decrease or increase in your consumption compared to the last four months and at the same time gain access to your history, observe each seasonal consumption and discover new ways of saving energy.

Easy, quick and safe payments


Pay your bills easily, quickly and safely via credit or debit card by having a complete and clear overview of all the payments you have made for each service.

Submit your measurements


You can register your meter indication on your own. In this way you are benefited from receiving only a “Clearance Bill” each month and by paying the energy you have truly consumed, putting an end to “On Account Bills” that include an estimated consumption. Thus, you can pre-estimate your monthly expenses in a more efficient manner.
Track your priced indications to have a clear overview of your consumption profile, as well as to be aware of when to register your indications.

Information and communication


Learn everything about the WATT + VOLT offers. Also, MyWatt offers the ability to render services anywhere you are by directly calling the Customer Service Department at 183 83 or by completing the communication form and one of our representatives will contact you shortly.

Activate MyWatt now and gain the complete control of your bill!
descriptionShort: See your account at a glance, with the MyWatt app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's new in MyWatt?

Natural Gas support is available on MyWatt.
You can now have access to your natural gas bills, your payments history as well as your consumption details.

Smooth loading
Content loading has been optimised to make the application user experience even better.

Faster performance
We made some background updates and fixes to ensure application responsiveness and reliability.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Now you can “access” the world of MyWatt easily, quickly & with absolute security, through Quick Login! Quick Login works with your Fingerprint, Face ID(depending on what your device supports) and with a 4-digit PIN of your choice. Browse your favorite energy app with Quick Login, safely straight away!

title: MyWatt WATT+VOLT

creator: WATT+VOLT
descriptionHtml:
MyWatt ensures the full control of the electricity and natural gas you consume, wherever you are! It is addressed to WATT+VOLT customers and is free of charge.

One of the application’s new features is the Quick Login. You can activate Quick Login with your Fingerprint, with Face Recognition (based on your device capabilities) and with a 4-digit PIN of your choice. You can now connect quickly, easily and safely!

With MyWatt, all the energy of your home and business is in your hand!

More specifically, by downloading MyWatt application on your phone:

You have a clear overview of your bills


- You are provided with a clear indication of the charges for the electricity and natural gas you have consumed.
- You track the course of your bills to be aware of when their due date is.
- You compare your bills in order to have an overview of your consumption related to the previous time period and if you wish, you can also download it in a pdf format for your personal files.

You pay easily, quickly and safely.



- You can pay your bills easily, quickly and with absolute safety via your debit or credit card.
- You have a clear overview of your payments for all your WATT+VOLT meters.


You can submit your measurements for your electricity meter.



- You just submit your meter measurements on your own and have the full control of your electricity consumption.
- Each month you will receive only an actual bill, thus paying for the energy you have truly consumed and putting an end to estimated bills containing the estimated consumption. This helps you in budgeting your monthly expenses in a more effective way!
- By tracking your priced indications, you have a clear overview of your consumption profile and so you are aware of when to submit your measurements.

You are in contact with us.



- You get informed on the new WATT+VOLT offers.
- You can get support wherever you are by directly calling our Customer Service at 183 83 or by filling in the contact form and one of our representatives will contact you shortly.


Download our updated MyWatt application today and gain the full control of your energy!

title: MyWatt WATT+VOLT

creator: WATT+VOLT
descriptionHtml:
With MyWatt, your favorite energy app, you can have the whole world of energy in your hands! With just 1 click, you can have the full control of your electricity and natural gas bills while enjoying innovative services that bear WATT+VOLT’s signature!
*The app regards WATT+VOLT’s clients and you can download it for free!
Keep reading to learn all about our app!

All your energy bills in 1 app!
• Get access to your electricity and natural gas bills history for up to three years
• Have a clear indication of your charges and compare the bills so that you have an overview of your consumption
• Know any time when your bills have been issued or when they expire and download them in pdf format for your personal files

Make your digital payments, easily and with absolute safety!
• Pay your electricity and natural gas bills easily, quickly and safely with your credit/debit card
• Save your cards so that you can use them automatically for future payments to save time
• Get access to all the payments you have made, check the method and the time you effected them, for up to three years

Submit your “Own reading” of your electricity consumption!
By submitting your measurements, you:
- Have the full control of your electricity consumption
- Receive clearance bill on a monthly basis
- Pay for the energy you have truly consumed without the estimated consumption of the “on account” bills
- Have a clear overview of your consumption profile and calculate better your monthly expenses
- Keep track of your priced measurements so that you know first-hand when you must submit your measurements

Change your info with 1 click!
With MyWatt you can change your contact details and the bill postage information without having to contact us. The changes are done easily and with safety and your data get updated in our base immediately.

Quick Login for your convenience and safety!
With Quick Login, you can have access in the app quickly and safely using Face ID, your Fingerprint or a 4digit PIN of your choice. You can use the Face ID and the Fingerprint options depending on your device.

Let’s keep in touch!
- Keep up with WATT+VOLT’s latest news, offers and services
- Contact us any time you wish at the following numbers 18383 & 2130189199 as well as by submitting a contact form (you can find it in the Profile section) so that a representative of ours can call you.

Download MyWatt app and explore the world of energy with WATT+VOLT!
